title: Leigh Sports Village - Wikipedia
snippet: Leigh Sports Village is a multi-use sports, retail and housing development in Leigh, Greater Manchester, England. The centrepiece of the development is a 12,000-capacity stadium which is home to professional rugby league team Leigh Leopards, the Manchester United Women's senior team, and Manchester ...

title: Leigh Sports Village Venue Hire | Manchester United WFC Stadium
snippet: Leigh Sports Village is proud to be the home of Manchester United Women FC, competing in the Barclays Women’s Super League and The FA Women’s Continental Cup.
